form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish an external provider scheduling program to assist the Department of Veterans Affairs in scheduling appointments for care and services under the Veterans Community Care Program, and for other purposes.

section.header: External provider scheduling program of Department of Veterans Affairs

paragraph.text: Subchapter I of chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 1703G the following new section:

subsection.text: There is established within the Department a national External Provider Scheduling Program (in this section referred to as the Program) to assist the Department in scheduling appointments for care and services under the Veterans Community Care Program under section 1703 of this title.

The Program shall consist of technology that allows schedulers of the Department to view the schedules of health care providers participating in the Veterans Community Care Program under section 1703 of this title and schedule, in real-time, appointments for care and services under such section.
The Secretary shall carry out the Program through an existing contract entered into by the Department, if feasible, or a new contract.
The Secretary shall ensure that the Program—

paragraph.text: reduces the time (measured in days) from referral of veterans to health care providers under the Veterans Community Care Program under section 1703 of this title to the actual scheduling of appointments for care or services under such section; and
reduces the time (measured in days and hours) for schedulers of the Department to schedule appointments for care or services under such section.

subsection.text: Not later than September 30 of each year through 2028, the Secretary shall submit to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs of the Senate and the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs of the House of Representatives a report on the progress of the Secretary in establishing the Program.

paragraph.text: The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 1703G the following new item:

subsection.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall ensure that the national External Provider Scheduling Program established under section 1703H of title 38, United States Code, as added by subsection (a)(1), is available to all medical centers of the Department of Veterans Affairs by not later than September 30, 2025.
Section 1703 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(2)(A), by inserting , including pursuant to the program under section 1703H of this title, after medical appointments; and
in subsection (h)(2)(B), by inserting , including pursuant to the program under section 1703H of this title before the period at the end.
